From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Actually, I'd like to limit which classes can become halfings.  
Skeletons and Ghosts should not become halfings because who, in their 
sane mind, would want to share powers with a character that can be 
zapped dead by any cleric experience level 4 or higher.  I would also 
exclude slime - unless someone wants other characters who can multiply 
on their own.  In such a case, I'd take a half-slime and half faerie; 
half-slime and half elf; etc.
